system.description:
This spell can paralyze any human, demihuman, or human-like creature (e.g., bugbear, dryad, gnoll, hobgoblin, kobold, lizard man, ogre, orc, nixie, pixie, or sprite). It has no effect on undead or creatures larger than ogres.

Single Target: If cast at a single creature, that creature makes a saving throw vs. spells with a -2 penalty.

Group Target: If cast at a group, it can affect up to four chosen creatures, but without a penalty to their saving throws.

Duration: Creatures failing their saving throw are paralyzed for 1 turn per caster level. The paralysis can only be removed by the reverse of this spell, *Free Person*, or by *Dispel Magic*.
